body:
What is this bar called

And how do i change how it looks, lets say to a pokemon theme.
body_tagged:
What is this bar called

And how do i change how it looks, lets say to a pokemon theme.
title: A little question.

replies.body: Themes. and you go to the chrome web store and type them in.
replies.body_tagged: Themes. and you go to the chrome web store and type them in.

replies.body: Idk what "that bar" is called but I do know that you can change how it looks by going to the chrome store
replies.body_tagged: Idk what "that bar" is called but I do know that you can change how it looks by going to the chrome store

replies.body: I believe it is called the taskbar.
replies.body_tagged: I believe it is called the taskbar.

replies.body:
I'll give every link you need. :)

- chrome-extension://jepibmfmhopgkplegmkjgifmhabbjadg/options/options.htm
- https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/my-chrome-theme/oehpjpccmlcalbenfhnacjeocbjdonic?hl=en

These links. With the Chrome Update it maybe best to go with the one link.:)

EDIT:
1st - Only for Google
2nd - Link for New Tab and Google

How it would look like.
replies.body_tagged:
I'll give every link you need. :)

- chrome-extension://jepibmfmhopgkplegmkjgifmhabbjadg/options/options.htm
- https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/my-chrome-theme/oehpjpccmlcalbenfhnacjeocbjdonic?hl=en

These links. With the Chrome Update it maybe best to go with the one link.:)

EDIT:
1st - Only for Google
2nd - Link for New Tab and Google

How it would look like.

replies.body: The "bar" is called the omnibox on Chrome ;)
replies.body_tagged: The "bar" is called the omnibox on Chrome ;)

replies.body:
Thanks very much guys!
After all this help I IMMEDIATELY got it. 
Now I have a Fluttershy computer background
A rainbowdash  New-Tab screen
And a Fluttershy cursor.
Its all so.....ponified. Its wonderful.
